chapters.title: Chapter 16: Shanna'har
chapters.info: Soffi Moraton, p. 233—A traveler with Perrin and Faile. She ripped her tent during a stream crossing and got it repaired the same day. The speed of her service, combined with the lack of service experienced by Varkel Tius, led Faile to suspect that Bavin Rockshaw was being less than completely honest in his duties as Quartermaster.
